model

Class Saving

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Saving

  • @Entity
public class Saving
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for Savings. Used in the creation of the database table for Savings through Hibernate.

        Parameters:
        desc - String describing the saving
        amountGoal - float indicating how much money should be saved in total
        reachedGoal - float indicating how much money has been saved until now
        date - Date indicating when the goal should be reached
